ing: 1/2 teaspoon ground cinnamon, or as desired (optional)
des: "No bake cookies! I used a combination of dried prunes and dried apricots. Even a pinch of coconut is good too!"
ins: Place peanut butter and honey in a microwave-safe bowl; heat in microwave on high until melted enough to stir, about 30 seconds. Add oats, dried fruit, almonds, whey protein powder, and cinnamon; stir to combine. Form into balls and place on a plate. Chill in refrigerator, about 1 hour.
